list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a stock or supply of money, materials, staff, and other assets that can be drawn on by a person or organization in order to function effectively.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: local authorities complained that they lacked resources
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chính quyền địa phương phàn nàn rằng họ thiếu tài nguyên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an action or strategy which may be adopted in adverse circumstances.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: sometimes anger is the only resource left in a situation like this
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đôi khi sự tức giận là tài nguyên duy nhất còn lại trong một tình huống như thế này

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: provide (a person or organization) with materials, money, staff, and other assets necessary for effective operation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: ensuring that primary healthcare workers are adequately resourced
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đảm bảo rằng nhân viên chăm sóc sức khỏe ban đầu được cung cấp đầy đủ
